article.author: Club Med
article.title: More Room to Roam and Reconnect in Paradise
article.lead: Relax and unwind at Club Med’s spacious all-inclusive resorts: surrounded by nature, spread across an average of 50 acres and operating at limited capacity.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_o-qal_6CGo?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Manulife
article.title: Introducing the Manulife COVID-19 PANDEMIC Travel Plan
article.lead: For some Canadians, travel is essential; as is coverage for unforeseen events. That’s why Manulife is pleased to introduce the COVID-19 Pandemic Travel Plan for travelling Canadians.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sYWmKUHc2IM?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
